title: Nice product
content:
Here are the refined reviews:

If you're a student, this is a good laptop at this price point.

Basic coding; suitable for CA, CS, and CMA students.

Advantages:

1. Best display in its price range - 5 stars.
2. Good battery backup - 4 stars.
3. Amazing performance considering the price point - 5 stars.
4. Lightweight and fast charging.

Disadvantages:

1. Speaker quality is very poor - 1 star (use earphones or headphones if you're particular about sound). 
2. Tends to overheat - 3 stars.
